All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
public class MyStage
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage

A specific stage for the BattleScreen, providing access to a list of Actors in order to deal mainly with resizing and manipulation of 2D objects.
